name: Wurm Coil
statusOutcome: ¡La cola larga y poderosa de [AttackerName] se apaga, enrollando hábilmente alrededor de [TargetName] en un abrazo apretado!
statusMiss: [AttackerName]'s long and powerful tail lashes out trying to coil around [TargetName], but [TargetHeOrShe] manages to avoid the tail's crushing embrace!
restraintStruggle: [TargetName] struggles against the crushing tail's coils...
restraintStruggleCharmed: [TargetName] squirms against the crushing tail's coils...
restraintEscaped: And breaks free of the tail that was wrapped tightly around [TargetHimOrHer]!
restraintEscapedFail: But can't break free of the tail tightly around [TargetHimOrHer]!
